howToUseShortDescription.text: Your eTicket entitles you to admission to Shanghai Disneyland Park on the date(s) indicated above. Each day of use of a Shanghai Disneyland® Resort ticket constitutes one full day of use.

description.text:
This ticket is valid for admission to Shanghai Disney Resort on the date you’ve selected.

Government IDs will be checked to confirm the age of Senior Guests.

Tickets are valid only on the specific date chosen. Tickets are nontransferable

Your digital ticket will be scanned at the front gate and you will be issued a physical ticket. This ticket will allow you to re-enter the park on the dates listed. Admit one. Other restrictions apply.

*Adult: 140+ cm | Senior: Ages 65+ | Child: 100 to 140 cm

mobile-theme-park-tickets-general-terms-.name: SHDR Mobile Ticket General Terms of Use for 1-Day Tickets

description.text:
This ticket is valid for same day admission to Shanghai Disney Resort one the date you’ve selected and the following day.

Government IDs will be checked to confirm the age of Senior Guests.

Tickets are valid only on the specific dates chosen. Tickets are nontransferable

Your digital ticket will be scanned at the front gate and you will be issued a physical ticket. This ticket will allow you to re-enter the park on the dates listed. Admit one. Other restrictions apply.

*Adult: 140+ cm | Senior: Ages 65+ | Child: 100 to 140 cm

mobile-theme-park-tickets-general-terms-.name: SHDR Mobile Ticket General Terms of Use for 2-Day Tickets

description.text:
Park Tickets Terms and Conditions

TICKETS AND OTHER ENTITLEMENTS ARE NON-TRANSFERABLE AND NON-REFUNDABLE, EXCEPT WITH OUR PERMISSION. TICKETS AND OTHER ENTITLEMENTS ARE REVOCABLE. THEY ARE VOID IF ALTERED.  The ticket must be used by the same person during its period of validity and is not valid for special events that require a separate admission charge.  Ticket dates can be modified only once and eligibility to modify is based on availability. Date changes must occur 2 days before the entitlement date. Guests who purchase tickets from a third-party reseller must complete exchanges or modifications from the same reseller.  To ensure safety and order in the park, or if we believe circumstances so require:

  • We reserve the right to deny admission, or to require a person already admitted to leave the park, without liability.
  • We may from time to time, without prior notice, change the operating hours of the park or any park attraction, close the park or any part of it temporarily, restrict the number of persons having access to the park, and/or suspend or cancel any attraction or entertainment program without liability.  Proof of identify and eligibility may be required for entry. 

Admission to Shanghai Disneyland is subject to park Rules and Regulations as posted on our website (https://www.shanghaidisneyresort.com/rules). At the park entrance, we will take photos of you as proof of your identify as the ticket holder. Please present your ticket for reentry to the park on the same day.  We may photograph, film, videotape and/or record in the park, and use these images and/or sound recordings, which may capture the portrait and/or voice of the Guests, for reasonable purposes without payment to any person.  We are not responsible for any loss or inconvenience caused by computer error, or unauthorized duplication or sale of the park’s tickets.  Each park eTicket printed confirmation allows one entry at a Shanghai Disneyland turnstile. Upon entry, the Guest will be provided with a standard park ticket for use for the applicable purchased days. In the event that duplicate park tickets are presented for park admission, we reserve the right to refuse entry.  All prices are in Chinese Yuan. Ticket orders are not confirmed until a confirmation number is received.   We reserve the right to cancel the sale of any undelivered tickets.   Children less than 100 cm in height receive free park admission.  Guests must be age 18 years or older to purchase tickets on the website. These terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. We reserve the final right to interpret these terms and conditions. For the purposes of these terms and conditions, "we" means either or both of “Shanghai International Theme Park Company Limited” and “Shanghai International Theme Park and Resort Management Company Limited”.

theme-park-tickets-general-terms-and-con.name: Theme Park Tickets Terms and Conditions

description.text: TEMP123 FPO: Not for resale. Non-refundable. Non-transferable. Void if altered. Revocable. This Disney eTicket allows for one entry at the Shanghai Disneyland main entrance turnstile. Disney is not responsible for any loss or inconvenience caused by computer error, or unauthorized duplication or sale of Disney eTickets. In the event that duplicate Disney eTickets are presented for theme park admission, Disney reserves the right to refuse entry. Not responsible for lost or stolen tickets or property. Not valid for special or premium events and or other activities. Obey all safety signage, instructions and rules. Parks, attractions or entertainment may change operating hours, close due to refurbishing, capacity, weather or special events, and may otherwise change or be discontinued without notice and without liability. Entry constitutes consent for Disney to use any film, video or likeness of bearer for any purpose whatsoever without any payment to the bearer. It is agreed between owners of the parks and ticket users that all claims for injury or loss arising incident to presence on owners’ property shall be litigated in [Location i.e. Orange county, California.] Subject to capacity and other restrictions.

mobile-theme-park-tickets-orderconfirmat.name: SHDR Mobile Order Confirmation Fine Print

howToUseSteps.text:
1. Have your printed eTicket ready to present, or bookmark this page on your mobile device.
  2. Proceed directly to the Main Entrance turnstile and present your eTicket or have it scanned from your mobile device that has Internet access. You will not need to wait in the Ticket Purchase queue.
  3. You will be granted admission to the park after your valid ticket has been scanned and voided, and you will be provided with a paper ticket for same-day re-admission (for the length of your ticket).

description.text:
Dated Tickets

Your tickets are valid only on the date(s) indicated above.

howToUseSteps.text:
1. Proceed directly to the Main Entrance turnstile and present the Second-Generation Government ID used when purchasing your ticket. You will not need to wait in the Ticket Purchase queue.
  2. You will be granted first admission to the park with your Government ID, and will be provided with a paper ticket for same-day re-admission (for the length of your ticket). If you do not have a Second-Generation Government ID card, please proceed to the Ticket Purchase queue to receive a paper ticket for admission.
  3. If multiple tickets have been added to the Government ID card, all Guests using these tickets must enter the park together as a group.

howToUseShortDescription.text: If you added your eTickets to your Government ID, you can follow the steps below instead.

description.text:
Proceed directly to a park entrance and present your ticket(s) or have it scanned from your mobile device that has Internet access. You will not need to wait in Will Call or Ticket Purchase lines.

After your eTicket is scanned, you will be issued a standard ticket, and your eTicket will no longer be usable. The standard ticket will be required for park re‐entry.

Government IDs will be checked to confirm the age of Senior Guests.

This ticket is valid for admission to Shanghai Disney Resort on the date listed.

title.text: How To Use Your Disney eTicket

mobile-theme-park-tickets-orderconfirmat.name: SHDR Mobile Order Confirmation eTickets Instructions
